Class ClientGUIView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.client.view.gui.ClientGUIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientView
public abstract class ClientGUIView extends Object implements ClientView
Abstract GUI implementation of the ClientView interface for displaying game information graphically. Provides methods to show game boards, menus and notifications in a graphical user interface.
